mapper.sql: id, sys_user_id, agent_id, user_id, mobile, message, sms_type, create_time
mapper.insert: insert into o_sms_log (id, sys_user_id, agent_id, user_id, mobile, message, sms_type, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sysUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{agentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smsType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update o_sms_log
sys_user_id = #{sysUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
agent_id = #{agentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

sms_type = #{smsType,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update o_sms_log set sys_user_id = #{sysUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, agent_id = #{agentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, message = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sms_type = #{smsType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from o_sms_log WHERE sms_type = 1 AND mobile=#{mobile} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1
